title: Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama
original_title: Sorority Babes in the Slimeball Bowl-O-Rama
overview: When three college guys get caught spying on a sorority ritual, they're forced to accompany the pledges on their next assignment: stealing a trophy from a bowling alley. But the token they pinch has a devilish imp who makes their lives a living hell.
